definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: We expect to produce series of W-Mo-Fe alloys in order to satisfy the demands of iron and steel industry.
sentences.chinese: 希望能開發出系列化產品，滿足鋼鐵工業的需求。

sentences.english: But with the world steel industry deep in the doldrums, who needed iron ore carries?
sentences.chinese: 世界鋼鐵工業很不景氣，誰還需要這些鐵礦砂船呢？

sentences.english: The iro and steel industry is very important to our life.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鐵工業對我們的生活有重要意義。

sentences.english: May 8, 1975, CPC holded a national steel industry forum.
sentences.chinese: 中共召開全國鋼鐵工業座談會。

sentences.english: The 21st century will be "a century of restructing" for steel industry.
sentences.chinese: 21世紀將是鋼鐵工業重組的世紀。

sentences.english: It has shown remarkable energy-saving results since the refractory fiber was used in steel industry.
sentences.chinese: 在鋼鐵工業中應用耐火纖維取得了明顯的節能效果。
鋼鐵工業被解除國有化了。

sentences.english: The main process chain, by-process chain and social -link chain are also designed.
sentences.chinese: 同時建立了生態鋼鐵工業產業鏈和社會功能鏈。

sentences.english: Main problems associated with Britains iron and steel industry today.
sentences.chinese: 如今英國鋼鐵工業的主要問題。

sentences.english: As a basic industry, iron and steel industry is facing with more and more market competition.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鐵工業是國民經濟的基礎行業。

sentences.english: The high ratio of iron to steel greatly affects the energy consumption of per ton steel in our country's iron and steel industry.
sentences.chinese: 鐵鋼比高對我國鋼鐵工業的噸鋼能耗影響極大。

sentences.english: Iron and steel industry in a nose-dive , the integrated steel industry in Shandong has accelerated expansion.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鐵工業連連，山東鋼鐵行業的整合加速擴張。
